modName: Culinomancy - The art of divination through food.
summary:
Ever wanted to turn your opponent into a tasty snack? Now you can, with bread transmutation! Simply cast, aim, and they become a pile of bread on the floor.

More spells to come.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5]The Art of Culinomancy
[/size]
A simple first-time mod that will involve food-based spells.

[size=4]Completed Spells[/size]

[list]
[*]Breadification - Turns the target into a pile of breadsticks. Expert level Conjuration
[/list]
[size=4]Planned Spells

[/size][list]
[*][size=4]Butterfingers - Tosses a stick of butter at the target, causing them to either disarm themselves when they attempt to use their weapon, or slip and fall over.[/size]
[*][size=4]Rain of Cabbages - Bring down the fury of a thousand cabbage farmers as flaming cabbages fall from the sky.[/size]
[*][size=4]More as we come up with them, or if they are suggested
[/size]
[/list]
author: APS247 and HorseAssassin
